pages.text: There are many kinds of Augments. They are all inserted and extracted the same way.

pages.title: Augments (Inserting)
pages.text: When inserting augments, they do not display on the pedestal, but some may effect the appearance of the pedestal. $(br) Inserting augments can be done with augment in the main hand, then Right Click the pedestal, this will remove one augment from your hand, placing it in the pedestal.

pages.title: Augments (Extracting)
pages.text: When extracting augments, put the Augment corresponding to the one your removing in the Offhand, then Left Click. This will remove the currently inserted Augment from the pedestal.

pages.title: Augment (Pedestal Info)
pages.text: When right clicking the $(l:pedestals:tools/linkingtool)Linking Tool$() or $(l:pedestals:tools/backwardslinkingtool)Backwards Linking Tool$() on the pedestal, your chat will display some info about the currently inserted augments.
